attributes.action: Close Schools to keep teachers and students safe why’ll covid numbers are high
attributes.additional_details:
Teachers , students and parents believe the risk of travelling to school and attending lessons  is too much of a risk . As a family myself who are meant to be shielding, why must our child attend if we are vulnerable. 
Protect our Teachers , pupils and parents and guardians Help protect our NHS . Until we can have vaccine . Learning online only
attributes.background: Make lessons online during third wave of pandemic until vaccine is given . Open schools for children at risk  or key workers only. Protect shielding families by not making members of same household to attend school .

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action:

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846
